title: Pixel 4 Shut Down and will not turn on or respond to charging
content: The Pixel 4 was sitting on my desk and randomly shut down by itself. The battery was nearly fully charged when this happened. I tried to hold down the power button for 30 seconds, hold down the power and volume down, and volume and power up and no response. I plug it back into the same charge that I had used to just charge the phone and get no response and does not show the phone is charging.
